meanings.definition: A type of fish with a flat body and both eyes on the same side of the head.
meanings.sent1: Flatfishes swim close to the ocean floor.
meanings.sent2: We saw a school of flatfishes while snorkeling.
meanings.sent3: The flatfishes had a meeting to discuss their favorite hiding spots.
meanings.sent4: In the world of flatfishes, blending in is the key to survival.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the unique appearance of the flatfishes.
